title: #580 - George Perez
description:
George Perez, Comedian seen on "Payaso Comedy Slam" and heard as the host of the, "George Perez Stories" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

Hims - Go to ForHims.com/joey for a trial month of everything you need to keep your hair - for just $5 while supplies last.
 
 MeUndies.com Go to meundies.com/JOEY for 20% off of your order of first order with free shipping in the US and Canada.

 Onnit.com - Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.

 

Recorded live on 04/29/2018.
